item.title: Charles Blow, Journalism’s Clunkiest DEI Hire, Out At The New York Times
item.description: Charles Blow's columns, without exception, were the clunkiest, most superficial, self-serious pieces of writing.

item.title: Here Are The 37 Brutal Murderers Joe Biden Let Off Death Row
item.description: A rundown of the gruesome murders committed by the death-row inmates getting commutations by President Joe Biden.

item.title: 12 Disgraceful Acts Biden Has Committed (So Far) On His Way Out The White House Door
item.description: While set to leave office in the next few days, Biden isn't done making stupid and dangerous decisions that harm Americans.

item.title: Biden’s Biggest Lies In MSNBC Oval Office Exit Interview
item.description: Biden complained his own party's oligarchy was losing control, defended liars in the media, and blamed red states for his dismal economy.

item.title: How BlackRock And The Rest Of The ‘Climate Cartel’ Stacked Exxon’s Board With Fossil Fuel Haters
item.description: The Big Three used the power they derive from investing other people's money to force compliance with a radical political goal.
